key.name: boot-wait
key.summary: Time to wait before first check (seconds)
key.description: A first check is made this number of seconds after startup

key.name: check-interval
key.description: Time to wait between two automatic checks

key.name: always-visible
key.description: If true, the indicator is always visible, even when non updates are pending

key.name: use-buildin-icons
key.description: If true, the build-in status icons are used instead of theme icons

key.name: show-count
key.description: If true, the indicator will display the number of updates pending

key.name: notify
key.summary: Send a notification when new updates are available
key.description: Send a notification when new updates are available

key.name: howmuch
key.summary: How much information to show on notifications

key.name: check-cmd
key.summary: Command to run to check for updated packages.
key.description: Command to run to check for updated packages.

key.name: update-cmd
key.default: "gnome-terminal -e 'sh -c \"sudo pacman -Syu ; echo Done - Press enter to exit; read _\" '"
key.summary: Command to run to update packages.
key.description: Command to run to update packages.

key.name: strip-versions
key.summary: Remove version numbers from checkupdates output

key.name: auto-expand-list
key.summary: Auto-open list submenu when updates count is lower than this number

key.name: package-manager
key.summary: Command to run to open package manager.

key.name: position
key.description: Position where the arch update will be displayed (left/center/right)

key.name: position-number
key.summary: Position of the arch update inside the box
